reviewText:
Fully explains the NATURAL GOLF METHOD created by Moe Norman
-if you want a more consistent way to play golf with less chance of injury-get this dvd!!  Newer instructors of the single plan golf method charge you a lot more $ for something that originated with what this DVD will give you!!  Bonus feature are excellent as well-to include a flexibility section from Katherine Roberts from Yoga for Golfers!!
Help me get my swing back...,great fixes and help...
REVIEW IT OFTEN FOR TIPS TO IMPROVE MY GAME, ITS WELL WORTH VIEWING OVER AND OVER

i would try to get the whole video so you can start with the basics and work your way up and i think it will improve your game.it has helped my game but not as fast as i thought because i didn't have the whole series.
